column3: Feel free to provide replacements with the right license...\n

http://static.inky.ws/image/3011/image.jpg (the image is a gif, not a jpg, but the site changes the extension of the files). Generated through http://ajaxload.info/ (license: from the same site, last line of the page, "Generated gifs are totally free for use"). If necessary I can convert the gif to a mng.\n
Best thing you can do is directly create a patch :).\n

I like the image.

I think converting it to mng and replacing the current spinner.mng is the
quickest way to get it integrated. In my experiments back in the day qt had
some problems with animated gifs.
I can't compile the QT, so can anyone test the mng? Thanks! Ah... was forgetting... changed the spinner to one from http://preloaders.net/en/circular\n
Second push with the connect icons (it is a separate push so that they can be merged separately if the icons aren't suitable)\n
